spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall layout follows the blueprint well. Significant errors in door orientation: the entrance door and bedroom door swing into hallways/external space rather than following the inward swing specified in the plan. The window in the dining area is missing its secondary pane on the left wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: The wash area and toilet partitions are slightly misaligned compared to the plan's grid. The staircase area lacks the internal structural wall/railing details shown in the blueprint, and the 'UP' entrance to the stairs is partially obstructed by hallucinated floor levels.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry is added where the plan shows open space. Dining chairs and living room sofa layout are mostly accurate, though the scale of the bedroom wardrobe is exaggerated.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with consistent lighting and clean geometry. Materials provide good visual clarity.

detected_errors.description: Entrance door and bedroom door swing orientations are reversed compared to the 2D plan.
Missing secondary window on the left-most wall of the dining room.
Hallucinated upper cabinets in the kitchen area not present in the floor plan.
The 'Wash Area' and 'Toilet' corridor width is slightly wider than the proportional grid allocated in the blueprint.
Kitchen sink and stove placement are swapped relative to the layout shown on the blueprint's right/top walls.
